column3: School of Natural and Computing Sciences
column5: Learn how to put into use cybersecurity processes that will protect computing infrastructures, from personal devices to national critical infrastructure. In this programme, you will examine the latest innovative cybersecurity and privacy practices and develop the knowledge and skills needed to work in distinct security and privacy roles in the industry. Through the teaching, you learn to evaluate, design, and build secure and privacy-preserving systems ranging from household devices such as household electrical items to large critical infrastructures like nuclear plants and energy grids. Studying this programme will also provide the necessary education to attain international cybersecurity certifications.
